orig_text:
delta: V_8 -> Q  bijective mapping that maps a binary string from V_8
           into an element from field Q as follows: string
           z_7||...||z_1||z_0, where z_i in {0, 1}, i = 0, ..., 7,
           corresponds to the element z_0+(z_1*theta)+...+(z_7*theta^7)
           belonging to Z,
correct_text:
delta: V_8 -> Q  bijective mapping that maps a binary string from V_8
           into an element from field Q as follows: string
           z_7||...||z_1||z_0, where z_i in {0, 1}, i = 0, ..., 7,
           corresponds to the element z_0+(z_1*theta)+...+(z_7*theta^7)
           belonging to Q,

notes: While I do not have access to the original GOST R 34.12-2015, I believe from implementations I've seen that '32*delta(a_15)' on the first line should be '32*delta(a_14)', unless a_15 is meant to be used twice and a_14 is to be discarded.
